name: Fairytale Fights
description:
Fairytale Fights is an arcade game developed by Playlogic Game Factory. It came out on 23-10-2009. Playlogic Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Fairytale Fights on PlayStation 3.
It was produced by Elke Herinckx. Olivier Lhermite directed the game. It was scored by Jonathan van den Wijngaarden and Pedro Macedo Camacho.
